summary: Comprehensive testing of BluBridge HRMS Admin and Employee modules completed. Backend APIs 100% working (45/45 tests passed). Frontend UI functional with minor issues identified.

minor.issue: Approved leave shows generic 'Leave' status instead of leave type (e.g., 'Sick Leave')

missing_features.issue: Missing Edit button on pending leave requests - employees cannot edit their pending leave applications
Stat cards (Total Research Unit, Total Support Staff, Upcoming Leaves, Pending Approvals) are not clickable - missing onClick navigation to respective pages

action_items: BUG FIX: In server.py line 1765, change status from 'Leave' to include leave type (e.g., f'{leave.get("leave_type")} Leave')
FEATURE: Add Edit button to pending leave requests in EmployeeLeave.js with edit functionality
ENHANCEMENT: Add onClick handlers to Dashboard stat cards to navigate to Team/Leave pages
critical_code_review_comments: server.py line 1765: Status should show leave type instead of generic 'Leave'
EmployeeLeave.js: LeaveCard component missing edit functionality for pending status
Dashboard.js: StatCard onClick prop exists but not used for navigation

success_rate.frontend: 95% (all pages load and function correctly, minor missing features)

seed_data_creation: Database seeded automatically on login page load via /api/seed endpoint
context_for_next_testing_agent: All backend APIs working. Focus on: 1) Verify leave type shows in employee attendance status after fix, 2) Test edit functionality for pending leave requests after implementation, 3) Test dashboard stat card navigation after implementation

dashboard.notes: 5 attendance tabs working, filter/reset buttons working, stat cards display correctly but missing navigation

employees.notes: CRUD operations working, search/filter working, export button present, pagination working

attendance.notes: Date range filter WORKING (reported bug appears fixed), status/team filters working

leave.notes: Leave Request/History tabs working, filters working, approve/reject functionality present

star_reward.notes: Employee cards with stars displayed, team filter working

team.notes: Departments and teams displayed with member counts

reports.notes: Attendance and leave reports with date filters working

dashboard.notes: Summary cards (Active/Inactive/Late/Early) working, live clock displayed, check-in/out working, quick links present

attendance.notes: Duration filters working, status filters working. BUG: Approved leave shows 'Leave' instead of leave type

leave.notes: Leave Requests/History sections working, Apply Leave form working. MISSING: Edit button for pending requests

profile.notes: All employee details displayed, Change Password functionality working
